## About Me {.about-section}

I'm an **MPA student at the London School of Economics**, specializing in **Economic Policy**. My work sits at the intersection of economics, data storytelling, and visualization—I believe complex economic concepts should be accessible and engaging.

### Background

-   **Economics Storyteller** - Translating data into narratives that inform policy decisions
-   **Data Visualization Specialist** - Creating clear, impactful visualizations using modern tools
-   **Policy Researcher** - Contributing to innovative projects in digital finance and economic analysis

### Connect

I write regularly on economics, policy, and data visualization:

-   [**Substack**](https://mylesowens.substack.com/) - Long-form essays on economic policy and analysis
-   [**LinkedIn**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/myles-owens/) - Professional updates and network
